tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE earnings_reports (
    report_id UUID,
    company_id UUID,
    report_date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL,
    net_income DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE balance_sheets (
    sheet_id UUID,
    company_id UUID,
    sheet_date DATE,
    assets DECIMAL,
    liabilities DECIMAL,
    equity DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (sheet_id)
);

CREATE TABLE balance_sheets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_date DATE,
    total_assets DECIMAL,
    total_liabilities DECIMAL,
    total_equity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_analysis (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_title VARCHAR(100),
    analysis_date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE earnings_reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    net_income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE balance_sheets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name TEXT,
    balance_date DATE,
    total_assets DECIMAL,
    total_liabilities DECIMAL,
    total_equity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    company_name TEXT,
    type TEXT,
    financial_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE balance_sheets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    assets DECIMAL(15, 2),
    liabilities DECIMAL(15, 2),
    equity DECIMAL(15, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_analysis (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    analysis_date DATE,
    ratio1 DECIMAL(15, 2),
    ratio2 DECIMAL(15, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_format VARCHAR(50),
    data_location VARCHAR(255)
);
